member.name: T:Sockets.ClientSocket
member.summary: Class that handles the communication with the server

member.name: M:Sockets.ClientSocket.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor that establishes the connection to the server It displays a MessageBox with an error message and closes the application If the connection fails

member.name: M:Sockets.ClientSocket.Send(System.String)
member.summary: The function used to send a string message to the server

member.name: M:Sockets.ClientSocket.Receive
member.summary: The method called to receive a string message from the server
member.returns: The bytes sent by the server decoded into a string
